alert.note: Alert for Hunt; Rockwall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 29 at 8:47AM CDT until October 30 at 3:10AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... South Fork Sabine River Near Quinlan affecting Rockwall and Hunt Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Fork Sabine River near Quinlan. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Minor out of bank flooding will occur. Additional rainfall up to half an inch is possible today and tonight, but river levels are not expected to rise to above flood late tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 16.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 5.2 feet Friday morning. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
